issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: When we try to run a new basic project in mobile web browser or mobile web inside emulator, we are thrown this error.
fields.summary: Unable to generate Mobile Web App. Error: 0 - Alloy

comments.body:
Hi Vinoth,

Can you test this with the latest version of Alloy and Titanium Studio, and let me know if it still occurs, If it does can you provide a log file of the error. Also in future tickets can you provide further information such as Titanium Studio Version and Ti SDK version.

Please read this guide for detailed information on how to submit a bug report: https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report
